title: Steering Head Bearing - Check

body.body: Make sure the motorcycle is stabilised and adequately supported.
A correctly supported motorcycle will help prevent it from falling.
An unstable motorcycle may fall, causing injury to the operator or damage to the motorcycle.
Raise and support the front of the motorcycle.

body.name: Steering Head Bearing check (HD7 Steering Head Bearing Check)

body.body: Hold the bottom end of the front fork outer tubes as illustrated and rock with a front-to-rear motion. If free play can be detected, the headstock bearings require adjustment.
